org.jetlang.channels

Class MemoryChannel<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetlang.channels.MemoryChannel<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Channel<T>, Publisher<T>, Subscriber<T>

    public class MemoryChannel<T>
extends Object
implements Channel<T>
    Conduit for exchanging messages between threads. Objects references will be delivered between threads without any serialization or object copying.

    Provides method for publishing and subscribing to events.

    Author:
    mrettig
